jet_control.JetControl¶

class jet_control.JetControl(name, injector, camera, params, diffract, **kwargs)¶

Jet tracking control class using jet_tracking methods

__init__(name, injector, camera, params, diffract, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

__init__(name, injector, camera, params, …) Initialize self.
calibrate() Calibrate the onaxis camera
jet_calculate() Track the sample jet and calculate the distance to the x-ray beam
jet_move() Move the sample jet to the x-ray beam
set_beam(beamX, beamY) Set the coordinates for the x-ray beam
